name: Tomato and Mozzarella Bites
recipeIngredient: 20 Small balls fresh mozzarella cheese (often labeled bocconcini)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a toothpick, spear a half of a tomato, a piece of basil, a mozzarella ball, and another half of a tomato. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Place on a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Mix the vinegar and oil together in a small bowl to serve as a dipping sauce.
